main event: A greyish white object was observed disappearing behind clouds, flying from north to south at a 45 degree elevation and a fast speed.
interesting points: The witness was a 13 year old civilian.
The data presented in the report was deemed inconsistent, with the total degrees of arc through which the object passed not included.
The case was carried as insufficient data for evaluation.
The conclusion was that the sighting was possibly a balloon.
The witness observed the object through a windshield and window glass, as well as a theodolite.
